Database Class¶

class SurveyManager.backend.Database¶

Class responsible for handling database connections and is the main class used to insert, update, and select records.

Properties

static string Server { get; set; }¶

The hostname of the database connection

static string Port { get; set; }¶

The port the database connection is listening on

static string DB { get; set; }¶

The name of the database to connect to

static string Username { get; set; }¶

The user name for the database

static string Password { get; set; }¶

The password for the database

static string ConnectionString { get; set; }¶

The full connection string

Public Static Functions

static void Initialize ()¶

Initializes properties with values from the connection string saved in settings. Sets the ConnectionString property using these values.

static void SaveConnectionString ()¶

Used to save the connection string to settings

static int CheckConnection ()¶

Creates a database connection on the given connection string and tests that it can be opened and closed. If it can’t, the error code returned by MySqlException is returned by this function.

Return

static DataTable ExecuteFilter (string query)¶

Executes a filter query built by a forms.dialogs.AdvancedFilter dialog.

Param query

The query to execute on the database.

Return

A DataTable containing all of the rows that matched the query.

It is up to the calling class to parse this data appropiately.

static ArrayList GetColumns (string tableName)¶

Retrieve a list of column names from the specified table.

Param tableName

The table to get the columns of

Return

An ArrayList of type string containing the column names.

static DataTable GetTableInfo ()¶

Run the _.show_table_status() stored prodedure to get information about tables.

Return

A DataTable ready to be used as a data source for a DataGridView Control.

static int GetLastRowIDInserted (string tablename)¶

Get the last row id inserted in the specified table.

Param tablename

The table’s name to search

Return

The id of the last row inserted

static int InsertAddress (Address a)¶

Insert into the database the Address a .

Param a

The Address to insert.

Return

The row id of the inserted object.

static bool UpdateAddress (Address a)¶

Update in the database the Address a .

Param a

The Address to update.

Return

True if the update was successfull; False otherwise.

static Address GetAddress (int id)¶

Get from the database the Address object represented by the primary key id .

Param id

The id of the address object.

Return

An Address object represented by the id.

static bool DeleteAddress (Address a)¶

Delete from the database the Address object.

Param a

The Address to delete.

Return

True if the address was deleted successfully; False otherwise.

static int InsertClient (Client c)¶

Insert into the database the Client c .

Param c

The Client to insert.

Return

The row id of the inserted object.

static bool UpdateClient (Client c)¶

Update in the database the Client c .

Param c

The Client to update.

Return

True if the update was successfull; False otherwise.

static Client GetClient (int id)¶

Get from the database the Client object represented by the primary key id .

Param id

The id of the client object.

Return

An Client object represented by the id.

static List<Client> GetClients ()¶

Get from the database all Client objects.

Return

A list of Client objects.

static bool DeleteClient (Client c)¶

Delete from the database the Client object.

Param c

The Client to delete.

Return

True if the client was deleted successfully; False otherwise.

static int InsertFile (CFile file)¶

Insert into the database the CFile file .

Param file

The CFile to insert.

Return

The row id of the inserted object.

static bool UpdateFile (CFile file)¶

Update in the database the CFile file . If the file has an ID of 0, it is inserted instead.

Param file

The CFile to update.

Return

True if the update was successfull; False otherwise.

static CFile GetFile (int id)¶

Get from the database the CFile object represented by the primary key id .

Param id

The id of the file object.

Return

An CFile object represented by the id.

static List<CFile> GetFiles (params int[] ids)¶

Get multiple files from the database based on the supplied ids.

Param ids

A variable length parameter: the list of ids of the file records to retrieve.

Return

A list of CFile objects or an empty list if no files were found.

static bool DeleteFile (CFile file)¶

Delete from the database the CFile object.

Param file

The CFile to delete.

Return

True if the file was deleted successfully; False otherwise.

static int InsertSurvey (Survey s)¶

Insert into the database the Survey s .

Param s

The Survey to insert.

Return

The row id of the inserted object.

static bool UpdateSurvey (Survey s)¶

Update in the database the Survey s .

Param s

The Survey to update.

Return

True if the update was successfull; False otherwise.

static bool DoesSurveyExist (string jobNumber)¶

Search the database for the specified jobNumber and get a value indicating if the job already exists.

Param jobNumber

The job number to search for.

Return

True if the survey job already exists; False otherwise.

static Survey GetSurvey (int id)¶

Get from the database the Survey object represented by the primary key id .

Param id

The id of the survey object.

Return

An Survey object represented by the id.

static Survey GetSurvey (string jobNumber)

Get from the database the Survey object represented by the job number jobNumber .

Param jobNumber

The job number of the survey object.

Return

An Survey object represented by the job number.

static List<Survey> GetSurveys ()¶

Get from the database all Survey objects.

Return

A list of Survey objects.

static bool DeleteSurvey (Survey s)¶

Delete from the database the Survey object.

Param s

The Survey to delete.

Return

True if the survey was deleted successfully; False otherwise.

Param ids

A variable length parameter: the list of ids of the line item records to retrieve.

Return

A list of LineItem objects or an empty list if no line items were found.

Param s

The LineItem to delete.

Return
